5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Among the people who recite the Qur’an with the most beautiful voices is the man who, when you hear him, you think that he fears Allah.’”

chapter.eng-name: Making one’s voice beautiful when reciting Qur’an
